attributes.action: Ban smartphones usage at schools in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Smartphone usage among children has been linked to a rise in mental health issues, including anxiety, depression, and attention disorders. Excessive screen time is also contributing to poor academic performance, sleep disturbances, cyberbullying, and a decline in physical activity and social interaction.

Several countries have already introduced restrictions or outright bans with positive outcomes in well-being and academic attainment.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call on the UK Government to introduce legislation that prohibits smartphones from being used in all primary and secondary schools nationwide by students.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action:

Require schools to ban students use of smartphones during school hours 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/719230
